file.name: invalid-type-request-spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Invalid Type Request Spec

paths:
  '/ok_type':
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OKType'

  '/ok_and/invalid/type':
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OKType'
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvalidType'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OKType'

components:
  schemas:
    OKType:
      type: string
    InvalidType:
      type: someinvalidtype

Error: parse: paths: /ok_and/invalid/type: post: : requestBody: content: application/json: parse schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/InvalidType": parse schema: unexpected schema type: "someinvalidtype"
